name: Aegon Capital Management
overview: Aegon Capital Management Inc. is a privately owned investment manager. The firm provides its services to pension funds, foundations, and institutional investors. It manages separate client-focused equity and fixed income portfolios. The firm also manages mutual funds for its clients. It invests in the public equity and fixed income markets across the globe. The firm invests in growth stocks of companies. It employs a fundamental analysis with bottom-up and top-down stock picking approaches to create its equity and fixed income portfolios. The firm operates as a subsidiary of AEGON Canada, Inc. Aegon Capital Management Inc. was founded in 2001 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.
